articles.title: Meta chatbot revelations renew scrutiny of company's track record on child safety
articles.summary: Meta is facing mounting pressure from lawmakers over how its artificial intelligence chatbots are interacting with children amid revelations that it approved ru

articles.title: Amy Klobuchar Calls for More Regulation on 'Horrible' Deepfake Vids
articles.summary: Senator Amy Klobuchar is waging war against artificial intelligence after falling victim to a "horrible" and misleading deepfake ... in which she appeared to comment on Sydney Sweeney's "perfect titties."
articles.translated_title: Amy Klobuchar Calls for More Regulation on 'Horrible' Deepfake Vids
articles.translated_summary: Senator Amy Klobuchar is waging war against artificial intelligence after falling victim to a "horrible" and misleading deepfake ... in which she appeared to comment on Sydney Sweeney's "perfect titties."

articles.title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek launches enhanced V3 AI model with China-made chip support and faster speeds
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek has rolled out an upgraded version of its flagship model, underscoring the country’s broader effort to cut reliance on U.S. technology. The new release, called DeepSeek-V3.1, adds support for China-made chips and promises faster processing speeds. While DeepSeek’s upgrade, shared in a WeChat post that isn’t publicly accessible, Reuters confirmed

articles.title: Google to offer Gemini AI to U.S. government agencies for 47 cents
articles.summary: The U.S. government struck a deal with Google to use its artificial intelligence and other applications for 47 cents, underbidding other AI partners.
articles.translated_title: Google to offer Gemini AI to U.S. government agencies for 47 cents

articles.title: Can the AI Boom Save DePIN Tokens? Why Investors Like Render, Akash, and Bittensor, Despite Underperformance In Bitcoin Bull Market
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is arguably the favorite investor story in traditional markets today, but the Web3 investor world has no intent to sit this one out despite not yet enjoying the fruits of the Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) bull market.
articles.translated_title: Can the AI Boom Save DePIN Tokens? Why Investors Like Render, Akash, and Bittensor, Despite Underperformance In Bitcoin Bull Market

articles.title: Anthropic in Talks to Raise Up to $10 Billion in New Funding
articles.summary: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic in Talks to Raise Up to $10 Billion in New Funding
articles.translated_summary: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.

articles.title: Tech giants prepare to challenge state AI regulations
articles.summary: Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.'s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.
